Package com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.views

This package contains the MapView and related classes.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MapView.InfoWindowAdapter
    Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when an info window will be shown.
    MapView.OnFlingListener
    Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the map is flinged.
    MapView.OnFpsChangedListener
    Interface definition for a callback to be invoked on every frame rendered to the map view.
    MapView.OnInfoWindowClickListener
    Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the user clicks on an info window.
    MapView.OnMapChangedListener
    Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the displayed map view changes.
    MapView.OnMapClickListener
    Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the user clicks on the map view.
    MapView.OnMapLongClickListener
    Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the user long clicks on the map view.
    MapView.OnMarkerClickListener
    Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the user clicks on a marker.
    MapView.OnMyLocationChangeListener
    Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the the My Location dot (which signifies the user's location) changes location.
    MapView.OnScrollListener
    Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the map is scrolled.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MapView
    A MapView provides an embeddable map interface, similar to the one provided by the Google Maps API.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    MapView.MapChange
    Map change event types.

Package com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.views Description

This package contains the MapView and related classes. MapView is the core component of this SDK and adds a map to your app.
